name: HH_EPSD_CARE_TEAM_INFO_HX
description: This table stores the audit trail information for the editing of Care Team information.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the episode record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: TEAM_ASSIGNMENT_C_NAME
columns.description: The audit trail of care team assignments populating column Team_ASSIGNMENT_C on table HH_EPSD_INFO

columns.name: EDIT_USER_ID
columns.description: The audit trail of user IDs that edited the column TEAM_ASSIGNMENT_C on table HH_EPSD_INFO

columns.name: EDIT_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: EDIT_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The audit trail of the instant changes were made to column TEAM_ASSIGNMENT_C on table HH_EPSD_INFO.
